Text.content:
The most interesting parts of the code are:

  • The call of ugc.initForm(): It checks if the form with the id provided in the constructor exists, and only if so, it returns true.
  • The call of ugc.init(sessionId): It initializes the mapping between content and form, registers the wait indicator, if given, and initializes the UGC session. Hence, the form is filled with the content values according to the mappings. Moreover, the optionally given form-init-handler is called.
